Python modules¶

Overview of the Python module(s) and classes.

EMIP modules¶

The emip module provides the basic classes that are used to define the tasks and task lists.

  • emip module

Classes used for specific tasks are implemented in the emip_* modules.

  • emip_omi module
  • emip_tropomi module
  • emip_satx module

File input/output¶

The following modules provide classes to read or write specific data files.

  • OMI module
  • TROPOMI module
  • satx module

Tools¶

The following modules provide generic classes used for building the application.

  • utopya module
  • rc module
  • gss module
  • catalogue module
